content: relaxed and casual the waffle stitch worsted hat is the perfect hat for zipping around the city or bopping around on a lazy day made entirely of knits and purls it s perfect for beginners and a quick and easy knit for old hands a stretchy cast on ensures that the hat stays nice and snug on your head and the level of slouch can be customised to your liking so go ahead and make it long like a rastacap or short like a beanie this pattern includes sizing for an adult small and adult large this pattern includes a full video tutorial that walks you through the stretchy cast on the textured rib how to decrease the hat and block it for a perfect fit one skein of berroco ultra alpaca is enough to knit this hat the sample hat was knit in color #6206 grab the free pattern and video tutorial here https //sheepandstitch com/pattern/how-to-knit-a-slouchy-hat-pattern/
